post_body: Alternative things to do in Podgorica

comment.body: Go to cafe sport bar at 16:00 and watch football game and bet on games 🙃 , see how they know all lower leagues teams from National south or north
As in they bet on UK games?

It is small tradition for us to bet on  UK teams as they start 16 ( 3 english time) to bet on “little englishmens” over 0,5 goal in first half 😂 make parley 10+ matches and hope for win 

Doncaster, Dulwich and Hamlet, York, Yeovil, Darlington, Dag and Red, Rochdale, Grimsby, … are some of teams that been followed every week from Montenegrins 😆 

If dont believe go for coffe F cafe on Roman Square  to see the people 😆
This is hilarious, thank you for this
